entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.17.0
entry.content:
ShellHub v0.17.0 - Release Notes

We're excited to announce the release of ShellHub v0.17.0! This version introduces several improvements, new features, and essential bug fixes that enhance the overall performance and usability of the platform. Below is a summary of the key changes.

üî• New Features

  • Namespace Invitations: Streamlined the process of inviting members to a namespace using emails, making team collaboration easier.
  • Namespace Options: Added support for retrieving namespace options, including enhanced management capabilities.
  • Premium Paywall Enhancements: Introduced a paywall for premium features in the community edition, with increased integration into the UI and cloud services.
  • Containers Route Alias: Added an alias for container listings, enabling easier filtering and management of containers.
  • Debugging Symbols in Development: Integrated debugging symbols in the development environment for API and SSH services.

üöÄ Improvements

  • UI Enhancements:
  • Improved sidebar styling and navigation for better user experience.
  • Introduced new breadcrumb-based navigation for better context in the UI.
  • Persistent hints and placeholders in terminal dialog fields for a more intuitive interface.

  • Increased content padding and improved spacing in the paywall interface.

  • Backend Performance:

  • Optimized DNS resolution and dynamic hostname resolution in the gateway.
  • Introduced cache management using generics to boost system efficiency.

  • Improved session and member data handling with streamlined query processes.

  • New Connector Service Requirements: Updated the gateway to manage connector services, providing robust and secure service handling.

üõ† Fixes

  • MFA Proxy Adjustments: Resolved issues with MFA authentication redirects in the gateway.
  • Namespace Creation: Fixed issues where certain users could not create namespaces.
  • Session Cleanup: Addressed bugs related to session handling and cleanup for better resource management.
  • User Invitations: Ensured correct handling of user membership invitations and status updates.

‚öôÔ∏è Dependency Updates

  • Updated various dependencies for improved security and stability, including:
  • Vue, TypeScript, Axios, FontAwesome, and Vuetify in the UI.
  • Go dependencies in the API, agent, and SSH services.

üì¶ General Improvements

  • Installer Updates: Overhauled the installation scripts for smoother setup and configuration.
  • OpenAPI Generator Removal: Simplified the project by removing unused OpenAPI generator dependencies.

üìù Other Changes

  • Miscellaneous fixes, typos, and performance enhancements across the platform to ensure smoother and more reliable operation.

Upgrade now to take advantage of these improvements and enjoy a better ShellHub experience! As always, we appreciate your feedback and support in helping us make ShellHub even better.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ui: bump vite from 5.4.8 to 5.4.10 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4256
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.55 to 18.19.59 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4257
  • ui: bump vue-tsc from 2.1.6 to 2.1.8 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4258
  • ui: bump sass from 1.79.4 to 1.80.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4259
  • ui: bump @vue/runtime-dom from 3.5.11 to 3.5.12 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4260
  • api: bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/mongodb from 0.33.0 to 0.34.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4261
  • fix(ui): change the never expiration api key option text by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4265
  • fix(ui): change the text from the namespace member remove modal by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4264
  • fix(ui): remove username field on namespace member edit by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4263
  • fixgateway,api,agent): public url access to devices' HTTP server by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4250
  • fix(agent,ssh): remove duplicated logs and add specific response when‚Ä¶ by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4267
  • feat(all): ignore docker binaries by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4268
  • feat: geoip mirrors by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4270
  • fix(pkg): ensures that geoip dbPath exists before fetch by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4272
  • ui: bump elliptic from 6.5.7 to 6.6.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4269
  • feat(ui): new community setup by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4274
  • feat(gateway,api,pkg): fit setup route to new rules by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4236
  • api: bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4275
  • ui: bump sass from 1.80.4 to 1.80.6 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4276
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.59 to 18.19.64 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4277
  • ui: bump vee-validate from 4.14.3 to 4.14.6 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4278
  • feat(agent,ssh,pkg): add support for agent forwarding by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4273
  • ui: bump qrcode.vue from 3.5.1 to 3.6.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4279
  • ui: bump vue-tsc from 2.1.8 to 2.1.10 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4280
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.1-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4283
  • fix(gateway): use device name as param on public URL due subdomain by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4284
  • feat(api): member self remove by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4281
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4285
  • refactor(ui): adjust settings layout and navigation by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4271
  • chore(docker): remove unused environment variables from compose file by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4287
  • fix(cli): improve service check reliability in CLI script by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4288
  • refactor(cli): centralize service check logic in exit_if_not_running by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4289
  • fix(ui): typos community setup screen by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4291
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4290

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(agent): implement method to generate CMD command to FreeBSD by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4293
  • feat(api): unique cronjobs by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4294
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.2-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4295
  • feat(api): recorded_sessions indexes by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4297
  • Feat/member self remove by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4296
  • chore: add gosec plugin to golangci-linter by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4286
  • chore(gateway, api): use secure middleware on echo and hidden nginx version by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4298
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.2-rc.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4299
  • chore(ui): typo api key generate by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4302
  • fix(ui): responsiveness problem in smaller devices on views titles by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4301
  • feat(ui): delete account on cloud instance by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4300
  • ui: bump @vitejs/plugin-vue from 5.1.4 to 5.1.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4303
  • ui: bump font-logos from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4304
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.7.3 to 3.7.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4306
  • ui: bump vee-validate from 4.14.6 to 4.14.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4307
  • ui: bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.28.0 to 9.30.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4308
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4316
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4318
  • fix(ui): open version validation by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4320
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.2-rc.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4321
  • Feat/leave namespace token by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4322
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.17.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.17.1...v0.17.2
